snippet.title: Twice Reborn: a vampire visual novel-- Trailer 2 "Trust Issues"
snippet.description:
Released on PC, Mac, Linux, Nintendo Switch, PS 4 & 5, and XBox in English, Spanish, Chinese, Russian, and Korean.

Nintendo Switch:
https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/twice-reborn-a-vampire-visual-novel-switch/
XBox:
https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/twice-reborn-a-vampire-visual-novel/9p7qxql2tlmd
Playstation:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2005-PPSA10994_00-TWICEREBORN00000
Steam Store:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1137100/Twice_Reborn_a_vampire_visual_novel/
Itch.io:
https://firststepcinematics.itch.io/twice-reborn

Official channel of First Step Cinematics LLC. 

If you wish to contact us, please do so through our website:

www.firststepcinematics.com/contact

Trailer Credits:

Music: Temporal Desolation by Darren Curtis

Voice Actors in this clip:
MARK: Joshua Story
Professor Michelson: Adam Clark
Dameon:  Siddhartha Villanueva
Belmonte:  Jonah Scott
Jody: Elissa Park
Ricky: Marlon Dunn
Brother Luke: Jeremy Smith-Sebasto

Produced and Written
Judith B. Shields

Sprite, CG, and Animation Cells
Aeghite 

Background Artist
Rachel Marks

Official channel of First Step Cinematics LLC. 
If you wish to contact us, please do so through our website:
www.firststepcinematics.com/contact
